ComicInfo.Summary:
Distant Relatives: part one: Liz recounts the recent exploits of her in-laws to her friend Kelly. Meanwhile, Doc learns that Frost has been exploring a parallel dimension that contains counterparts of the Noble family.
The Ring: Flashback story of the engagement of Rusty and Celeste.
ComicInfo.Title: Distant Relatives: part one; The Ring
